.

Definition of Doneness. Provide any status from workflow on which DOD is considered. Difference between the latest date of theses statuses and release end date will be considered as the Lead Time.

Note: This configuration will be ignored if Lead Time KPI calculation logic is set to Repo Data.

Note: This configuration will be ignored if Issue Type is not provided.br> Example: Closed,Done.

fieldLabel: Count of days from the release start date to calculate closure rate for prediction

tooltip.definition: If this field is kept blank, then daily closure rate of issues is calculated based on the number of working days between today and the release start date or date when first issue was added. This configuration allows you to decide from which date the closure rate should be calculated.
